description: Working with developers on schema migrations is a perennial challenge for DBAs and the developers. Devs tend to like a "set it and forget it" tool. This talk discusses the strategies used to move from a pure SQL and shell migration system to using an ORM and alembic for maximum DBA and developer happiness.
